title: Bug 115960 - Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: The datetime values retrieved from a table are displaying in different formats in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
EB: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Enter 'new Date()' as the content for three items.
2. Save and preview.

Expected result: The datetime values should be displayed in the same format in all three items.
Actual result: The datetime values are displayed differently in the dynamic text item compared to the data/text item.
